alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Clay; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued February 25 at 4:54AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THIS IS A CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK. THE FORT WORTH POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR HARMONY RODRIGUEZ, BLACK, FEMALE, 11 MONTHS OLD, BORN MARCH 30 2021, 26 INCHES, 30 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES, AND LAST SEEN WEARING A YELLOW AND BROWN ONESIE. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR LANCELOT ZAIRE DAWKINS, BLACK, MALE, 26 YEARS OLD, BORN JUNE 6 1995, 6 FEET 2 INCHES, 150 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR AND BROWN EYES IN CONNECTION WITH HER ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A WHITE, JEEP, WRANGLER WITH UNKNOWN LICENSE PLATES, BLACK TRIM AND BLACK STEPS. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST HEARD FROM IN FORT WORTH, TX. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE FORT WORTH POLICE DEPARTMENT. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS FORTH WORTH POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 8 1 7 3 9 2 4 2 2 2.
